description: Use to update the components listed by target under the -_includes/docs-toc.html file. Check the .readme file for more information of the JSON file
hlp_in: Defaults to ../_includes/docs-tocs.html, use --in <file>, if you want to use a different file.
hlp_ln_2_add_cmpnnts: Updates 'assign valid_components = ... , use --r <string> to use a differnt line.
hlp_out: Defaults to ../assets/simple-jekyll-search/search.json, use --out <file>, if you want to use a different file..
hlp_str_2_match: search string to match in the JSON file  by default is 'assign valid_components =', unless a vales passed by --s <str>.
